definition: compound with many families living together
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The family that sold it to Mr. Gittes had turned it into a warren of apartments for various relatives.
sentences.chinese: 賣給吉茨的這家人把它變成了衆多親屬居住的大雜院。

sentences.english: Southern wall into our courtyard garden.
sentences.chinese: 南牆根成了我們大雜院的菜園子。

sentences.english: A few colourful dragon-flies even carne to flit over the puddles in the tenement yard.
sentences.chinese: 連大雜院裏的水坑上也來了幾個各色的蜻蜓。
